title: Collect a Stunning 100,000 dWatt
description: Ascent to greater heights in energy collection! To be rewarded, amass a significant 100,000 dWatt.

dialogue.text: The next horizon awaits, energy aficionado! How about making it to the 100,000 dWatt milestone? I've seen your progress, and I have faith in your capability to achieve this!

options.text: Your faith is well-placed. Here's 100,000 dWatt!

dialogue.text: Every time, you astonish me with your dedication. Truly a master of energy. Here's a well-earned reward for your prowess.

options.text: Thank you for the guidance, Orion!
